divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a ciggerate at work and saw a white object flying over very slow. I went inside, came back out, and it was flying over again even slower. Then I kept looking for it and it came much closer, then veered to the right and backwards about 20 miles within 2 seconds. It then proceeded to hover in one spot for a half an hour and started to slowly move away and finally disapear.
Summary: White ball flew in different directions, then stopped in sky for half hour
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Carmel
There were no other sightings in Carmel on or around October 5th 2009
